by-signing-up-you-agree-with-our: By signing up, you agree with our
empty_message_builder_name_format: The builder '%s' is not yet in our database.Complete your sign-up to add it into the HomeSphere system.We will be in touch for further instructions.
enter-a-new-password-and-confirm: Enter a new password and confirm
enter-your-email-address-to-receive-a-ve: Enter your email address to receive a verification code
not-received-email-try-to-request-a-new-: Not received email? Try to request a new one!
enter-the-verification-code-we-sent-to: Enter the verification code we sent to
to-finish-the-sign-up-process: to finish the sign up process.
not-found-builder-name-format-message: The builder '%s' is not yet in our database. Complete your sign-up to add it into the HomeSphere system. We will be in touch for further instructions.
at-new-address-start-new-capture: At a new address? Start a new capture
looks-like-this-is-your-address: Looks like this is your address, edit if incorrect
home-address-detected: Home's address detected, edit if incorrect
start-at-new-address-or-add-a-capture-to: Start at new address or add a capture to this address
sorry-we-could-not-find-an-address: Sorry, we couldn't find an address
redrag-the-map-to-automatically-fetch-ne: Redrag the map to automatically fetch new location
select-which-area-of-the-property: Select which area of the property
search-for-an-address-date-or-area: Search for an address, date, or area
password-changed-successfully: Password changed successfully. Please now use your new password to login
your-old-password-has-been-changed: Your old password has been changed
the-entered-otp-is-invalid: The entered OTP is invalid. Please try and request for new reset password.
the-entered-otp-has-expired: The entered OTP has expired. Please request for new reset password.
do-you-want-to-log-out-from-the-applicat: Do you want to log out from the application?
where-do-you-want-to-pick-your-profile-p: Where do you want to pick your profile photo?
there-are-errors-in-the-form-please-chec: There are errors in the form. Please check and try again
account-activation-succeeded-welcome-to-: Account activation succeeded. Welcome to HomeSphere!
account-activation-succeeded-please-logi: Account activation succeeded. Please login using the created credentials
your-user-account-has-not-been-activated: Your user account has not been activated.
Your user account has not been activated. Please contact administrator for support.
your-user-account-has-been-locked: Your user account has been locked.
your-user-account-has-been-locked-contac: Your user account has been locked. It can be due to many failed login attempts. Please contact administrator for support
please-enter-a-manufacturer-to-proceed: Please enter a manufacturer to proceed.
your-builder-account-has-not-registered: Your builder account has not registered with HomeSphere rebate program. Our administrator will come back to you when your account is ready to be used. Sorry for the inconvenience.
discard-prompt-message: Would you like to discard this capture? The capture will not be saved.
cancel-prompt-message: Would you like to cancel the changes to this capture?
delete-account-message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? It cannot be undone.
please-enter-valid-email-adress: Please enter a valid email address.
invalid-user-credentials-message: The credentials you entered are incorrect.
you-must-allow-the-app-for-using-camera: HomeCapture needs access to your camera in order to take photos. Please enable Camera access in the Settings.
password-has-been-used-enter-a-different: Password has been used. Enter a different password.
please-enable-location-message: HomeCapture needs access to your Location in order to detect address. Please enable Location access in the Settings.
